attributes.action: Introduce a maximum time limit an individual MP can legally remain in office.
attributes.additional_details: In order to create a freer fairer society.
attributes.background: End the corrupt system that can allow a failing, useless MP to stay in power for 15 years. There should be introduced a maximum term that any individual can serve. This term should be for 2 sessions of parliament. Whether consecutively or not. This term should total no more than 8-10 years.
